question: The government should reduce the amount of money spent on local environment problems and instead funding into urgent and more threatening issues such as global warming? - To what extent do you agree?
text: The country is witnessing a growing problem of environmental as well as global warming Day by Day. It has become a matter of concern as global warming is growing much faster than the status so the ministry should take action very quickly against that increasing global warming so that global warming and the increase in the climate can be reduced.

The union spends more on the situation should increase the cost behind global warming by reducing the cost behind the habitat as global warming is increasing Day by Day. There are a lot of effects due to global warming, Such as excessive heat as well as the rain becomes unpredictable Such global warming has a serious impact.Therefore, the power should take immediate action against such a growing situation.

Reduce global warming, the situation must be stopped from being polluted. The movement of old vehicles should be controlled to prevent air pollution so that air pollution is avoided. Trees that are being cut down by people should be stopped as well as encouragement to plant new trees. The power should spend on finding a chemical behind agriculture so that farmers can prevent the status from being polluted by spraying the pesticide. Thus the regime should spend behind different space items to reduce global warming.

In conclusion, The state should reduce the amount of heat and pollution caused by old vehicles as well as increase the cost of planting. New trees to reduce global warming.Thus the rule should take steps to reduce global warming.
